title: “Pod Lang Syne.”
description: In a special New Year’s episode, Jon, Jon, Tommy, Dan, Erin Ryan, DeRay Mckesson, Ana Marie Cox, Ira Madison, and Louis Virtel discuss their resolutions for 2019.
author: hey@crooked.com (Crooked Media)
